net.ddns.drj7z.poc.beanvalidation
Class Poc

java.lang.Object
  net.ddns.drj7z.poc.beanvalidation.Poc

public class Poc
extends Object

A proof-of-concept for show how to validate a bean using Spring and Bean Validation 1.1 specification. Validated bean is RegisterDataImpl implementing RegisterData. Class's run() method:

  1. creates a RegisterDataImpl object;
  2. fills some object's fields;
  3. validates it (via inject (by spring) validator;
  4. prints all validation error.
Fields values can be customized via net.ddns.drj7z.poc.beanvalidation.messages This poc use a customized ResourceBundleMessageInterpolator (MyResourceBundleMessageInterpolator) in orde to allow to easily print property name together with error message. See MyResourceBundleMessageInterpolator for more details.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
drj7z
